Detailed Description

The class will receive Demand sent by sendBroadcast().

If you want to receive Demand sent by sendBroadcast(), you can register a Subscriber to system. Then you can receive Demand which you want from sendBroadcast() and the onReceive() in Subscriber will be called.

Before register a Subscriber, we need to add Action to DemandFilter and implement onReceive() function.

The follow example demonstrates how to set and register Subscriber class.

 class MySubscriber : public Subscriber {
   public:
      virtual void onReceive(Context* context, const Demand& demand);
 };

 void MySubscriber::onReceive(Context* context, const Demand& demand) {
   if(demand.getAction().compare("EVENT1") == 0) {
      demand.getIntExtra(String("key1"), 1);
   } else if(demand.getAction().compare("EVENT2") == 0) {
      demand.getStringExtra(String("key2"));
   }
 }

 class MyPage : public Page {
   public:
      MySubscriber* mpSubscriber;
 };

 void MyPage::onStart() {
   DemandFilter filter;
   filter.addAction("EVENT1");
   filter.addAction("EVENT2");

   mpSubscriber = new MySubscriber();
   Context(this).registerSubscriber(*mpSubscriber, filter);
 }

 void myPage::onStop() {
   Context(this).unregisterSubscriber(*mpSubscriber);
 }
